services.en: Airport pickup is provided for each student upon their arrival in the San Francisco area, USA.
services.zh: 每位學生抵達美國舊金山地區後都會獲得機場接送服務。

services.en: Monthly reports can be requested by parents.
services.zh: 家長可以要求每月報告。

services.en: Orientation and in-person training for students about living in America
services.zh: 為學生提供有關美國生活的指導和現場培訓

services.en: Initial shopping trip for food and necessities.
services.zh: 最初的食品和必需品購物之旅。

services.en: Area orientation, guidance on transportation to the school.
services.zh: 區域定位、到校交通指導。

services.en: Help to become familiar with the campus as well as school policies.
services.zh: 幫助熟悉校園以及學校政策。

services.en: Assistance with opening a bank account and setting up a cell phone.
services.zh: 協助開設銀行帳戶和設定手機。

services.en: 24/7 staff on-site to ensure a smooth transition for students in their college life and studies.
services.zh: 24/7 工作人員現場服務，確保學生順利過渡大學生活與學習。

services.en: Individual grades management and advice available upon request
services.zh: 可根據要求提供單獨的成績管理和建議

services.en: Legal advice if the student encounters any legal issues including school suspension.
services.zh: 如果學生遇到任何法律問題（包括停學），提供法律建議。

services.en: 24/7 services assist students and their parents in case of emergencies.
services.zh: 24/7 服務在緊急情況下為學生及其家長提供協助。

services.en: Guardianship services are available for individuals under 18 years old.
services.zh: 監護服務適用於 18 歲以下的個人。
